sentence.Network_en: Now, doctor, don't you come bothering me with that dictionary bosh.
sentence.Network_cn: 呃, 大夫, 你别拿那套渊博的鬼话跟我胡搞.

sentence.Network_en: When you want to get revenge on a woman you don't kill her - bosh!
sentence.Network_cn: 你要对一个女人报仇的话,用不着要她的命 -- 没那么傻.

sentence.Network_en: Bosh is 7 for 19, I hope he bounces back next game.
sentence.Network_cn: 波什19投7中, 我希望他能在下场比赛卷土重来.
